description: POLYGON - Ashbury & Oak. Beautiful 3 Bed + Den (4th Bed) / 3 Bath townhome featuring a bright, spacious open-concept layout with 9' ceilings. The ground floor offers a den conveniently located by the front entrance-ideal as a 4th bedroom or a perfect home office for a home-based business. Double side-by-side garage and a fully fenced, oversized front yard for added privacy and outdoor enjoyment. Enjoy an impressive 8,000 sq.ft. resort-style clubhouse with outdoor pool, hot tub, fitness centre, billiards, pet washing station, kids' playroom, and guest suites. Upgrades include brand new carpets and a new fridge. Prime location within walking distance to R.E. Mountain Secondary (IB Program), Yorkson Creek Middle, Lynn Fripps & Uplands Elementary, plus Carvolth Bus Exchange, Town Center.
